title: Provide Trip Planning Assistance
description: A tourist calls the customer service line for help planning a trip from their hotel to a museum using public transit.

tasks.description: Gather the origin (hotel address) and destination (museum address) from the caller.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly notes the start and end points of the trip.

tasks.description: Use a trip planning tool to find the best route.
tasks.expected_outcome: The tool returns a recommended trip: 'Take Route 12 bus to Central Station, then transfer to the Red Line train.'

tasks.description: Clearly communicate the step-by-step instructions, including bus/train numbers, stop names, and estimated travel time, to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer understands how to make their trip.
